extensionDescription.message: A lightning-fast userscript manager engineered for developers who demand speed and efficiency.

welcomeSubtitle.message: The next-gen userscript manager built for speed

step1_text.message: Zedmonkey is a lightning-fast extension that lets you run custom userscripts on any website. These scripts can enhance functionality, change layouts, or automate tasks on your favorite sites.

step1_highlight.message: Speed and efficiency with no compromises

step2_title.message: How do I load a userscript?

step2_text.message: You can create your own scripts or install existing ones from sites like Greasyfork or OpenUserJS. Just click the "+" button in the Zedmonkey popup or click on .user.js links across the web.

step3_title.message: Where do I edit and enable/disable scripts?

step3_text.message: Click the Zedmonkey icon in the toolbar to see your scripts. From there, you can enable/disable them with toggles or click on a script to edit it in the built-in editor.

cloudSyncDesc.message: Sync to Dropbox, Google Drive and other services

enhancedSecurityDesc.message: Our clean format has built-in security features

trialMessage.message: Give Zedmonkey a try for just

footer.message: Â© 2025 Zedmonkey Project. Lightweight by design, powerful by default.
